title: Promotion issues
body:
I lose one promo series and it says im done with promotion games. Like WHAT????
It was my promo series to silver one and the series ended with my first loss. What's happening??

replies.body: It sounds strange that your series would end after one game, so I took a look into this for you.  It looks like there was a[ queue dodge ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)previously, which counted as a loss.  As a result, losing the next game ended the series.  The series loss is a bummer, but it looks like you're pretty close to entering another one and I wish you the best of lucl!
